page.title: 13Education
page.content: The old school which closed in 1965, is now used as an Expedition Centre by Northumberland Education Committee. Two nearby, adjoining old cottages have been converted into dormitories. The Centre is used during the week mainly by schools (usually urban), and at the weekends by youth groups.Other users are hospitals for the handicapped, and sometimes by First School groups. During July we often have youth groups from Germany staying.These are usually organised through the German YMCA. Every Tuesday evening there is a local Youth Group meeting, run by Mr. Johnny Common of Harbottle. Sometimes at the weekends the facilities of the First school are used by the youth groups.
